{{Description|Notes left behind by a top student. Many useful spells are listed, and the handwriting is beautiful.}}
'''Apprentice's Notes''' is a 1-Star [[catalyst]]. It is part of the [[1-Star Series]].

==Ascensions and Stats==
{{Weapon Ascensions and Stats
|ascendMat1 = Tile of Decarabian's Tower
|ascendMat2 = Debris of Decarabian's City
|ascendMat3 = Fragment of Decarabian's Epic
|bossMat1   = Heavy Horn
|bossMat2   = Black Bronze Horn
|commonMat1 = Damaged Mask
|commonMat2 = Stained Mask
}}

==Description==
With words, this book records learning, experiments, and incantations.<br>
With the spaces between words, it records a student's striving.

==Gallery==
<gallery>
Weapon Apprentice's Notes 3D.png|Full Weapon - Base
Weapon Apprentice's Notes 3D 2nd.png|Full Weapon - 2nd Ascension
</gallery>

==Availability==
*Randomly found in Common or Exquisite [[Chests]] in all of [[Teyvat]]
*Dropped when interacting with some [[Investigation]] points
*Provided as the default weapon of newly obtained Catalyst-wielding [[Character]]s

{{Shop Availability}}

==Trivia==
*[[Lisa]] is seen wielding this catalyst in [[Xiangling]]s' [https://youtu.be/TvqGRUWm8qE official Character Demo].
